kjv_def: bow (down), be far spent, lay, turn to flight, wear away
strongs_def: to slant or slope, i.e. incline or recline (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. transitively
    1. to incline, bow
    2. to cause to fall back
    3. to recline
      1. in a place for repose
    4. intransitively
      1. to incline one's self
        1. of the declining of the day
